item.title: 환영합니다!
item.description: 새로운 보관함입니다. 내용을 한번 적어보세요, create a link, 혹은 임포터를 사용해봐도 좋습니다! 준비가 됐다면 이 노트를 삭제하고 맞춤형 보관함을 만들어보세요.

item.title: 2025, Body’s First Architecture
item.description: The Ely Center for Contemporary Art is thrilled to present Body’s First Architecture, a group show curated by the artists Tamar Ettun and Leeza Meksin, exploring the various ways in which fabric and clothing are being employed by contemporary artists foregrounding the body’s needs for healing.

item.title: 2022, Feather
item.description: 우한나, 정수정 : Feather 날짜 : 2022. 4. 6 ~ 4. 24 시간 : 1 ~ 7 pm (월, 화 휴무) 장소 : CYLINDER (서울특별시 관악구 양녕로 1길 48).
